Class BulletThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • graphics.BulletThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class BulletThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Thread used for bullet animation after a shot.
